thread.title: Apple Alumni Where Are They Now
thread.title_full: Apple Alumni Where Are They Now

title: Apple Alumni Where Are They Now
text:
Apple Alumni: Where Are They Now? 
Forbes Thursday 22nd October, 2015 
Andy Hertzfeld was a member 
of the original Macintosh development team in the early 1980s and helped design 
the operating system software. His Apple business card read ';software wizard.'; 
He is now a software engineer at Google, and was the key designer of the 
Circles user interface in Google+....
